description.message: Set a new wallpaper from 500px website as background of your New Tab page.

welmessage.message:
Welcome !
Thanks for having install this addon.

welreq.message: Due to a technical compatibility, this addon require to have Firefox version 60 at least installed.

weldon.message: If you wish to make a donation to the devlopper, please click on the link below. It will reward the work and time spent in development.

welmore.message: You wish to report a bug, submit a request, participate in the translation? Click on the link below to access the repository page.
